original_text: Therefore it is against the Lord that you and all your company have gathered together. What is Aaron that you grumble against him?”
korean_text: 이를 위하여 너와 너의 무리가 다 모여서 여호와를 거스르는도다 아론이 어떠한 사람이기에 너희가 그를 원망하느냐

sentences.original_text: Therefore, it is against the Lord
that you and all your company have gathered together
sentences.korean_translation: 너와 너의 모든 무리가 함께 모인 것이다
